section.title: Child Node Constraint
section.para: Find all nodes with the primary type 'nt:folder' that are children of node by path "/root1/root2". Only find children, do not find further descendants.

section.title: Repository Structure
section.para: The repository is filled by "nt:folder" nodes. The nodes are placed in a multilayer tree.

listitem.para: folder3 (nt:folder) // This node we want to find
folder4 (nt:folder) // This node is not child but a descendant of '/folder1/folder2/'.
folder5 (nt:folder) // This node we want to find

section.title: Query Execution
section.para: The use of "%" in the LIKE statement includes any string, therefore there is a second LIKE statement that excludes that the string contains "/". This way child nodes are included but descendant nodes are excluded.
